os.fullpath: Operating System :: Emulation and API Compatibility :: Cygwin (MS Windows)

name: Multi Computer Clipboard
short_description:
Ever had two computers side by side, maybe a laptop and a desktop and you're working on one and then need to use the other but all your data is on the other computer?

Well, with this nifty little program you don't have to worry about that!

On first run, you select where the Clipboard.ini file is (Share this file on your network)

Then select a number 1 or 2, your preference, but don't select the same number of both computers.

IE: Put your laptop as number 1, and your desktop as number 2.

After that, anytime you copy text (Won't copy pictures) it is saved to this file.

Once that is done, you can paste (Control + V) on either computer, and use either's clipboard.

Example:

Laptop (Computer 1) has copied the text "Lol". On Desktop (Computer 2) you can press Control + V and then press 1 (Remember, Computer 1) and it will paste "Lol'.Simple and easy!
